Ryan Wesslen is Executive Director and Principal of NLP & GenAI at [Wells Fargo](https://www.wellsfargo.com/). Prior to this role, Ryan was ML Engineer and Customer Lead at [Explosion](https://explosion.ai) and led an NLP team in [Bank of America](https://www.bankofamerica.com/)'s Chief Data Scientist Organization.

Ryan holds a Ph.D. in Computing and Information Systems and master's degrees in economics, financial mathematics, and data science. He has published over [20 articles in human-computer interaction and computational social science with 750+ citations](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=F40SbCkAAAAJ&hl) and teaches as an adjunct faculty member at [UNC Charlotte's School of Data Science](https://sds.charlotte.edu/).
:::
